ihs.apcs.spacebattle.commands

Class CloakCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • ihs.apcs.spacebattle.commands.ShipCommand
      • ihs.apcs.spacebattle.commands.CloakCommand

  • public class CloakCommand
extends ShipCommand
    A command to cloak a ship. Ships that are cloaked are invisible to radar for a specified amount of time. Ships will automatically decloak if they raise shields or fire a torpedo. Cloaking will fail (but still incur the energy cost) if the ship's shields are up at the time of cloaking.

    Cloaking is a non-blocking operation.

    Since:
    0.9
